mapper.update: update t_person set passwd = #{passwd}, authority = #{authority}, name = #{name}, sex = #{sex}, birthday = #{birthday}, department = #{departmentId}, job = #{jobId}, edu_level = #{eduLevelId}, specialty = #{specialty}, address = #{address}, tel = #{tel}, email = #{email}, state = #{state}, remake = #{remake} where id = #{id};
mapper.select: select p.id,p.name,p.passwd,p.sex,d.name department_name,e.description edu_level_name,j.description job_name ,p.authority,p.address,p.birthday,p.email,p.remake,p.specialty,p.tel,p.state from t_person p, t_department d, t_job j, t_edu_level e where p.department = d.id and p.job = j.code and p.edu_level = e.code;
